p: Treating the MDR strains of P. aeruginosa to SKEO with antibiotics showed a FICI value between 0.37 and 0.45, indicating a synergistic effect ( table 2). For most of the tested bacteria, the results of the checkerboard assay were indifferent. A combination of SKEO with gentamicin or norfloxacin did not show any synergistic effect against PAO1 strain. SKEO combined with norfloxacin showed a maximum effect against PA11 (FICI: 0.37). While SKEO reduced the MIC value of gentamicin and norfloxacin by up to 4- and 8-fold, respectively.
